 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחַץ‎</span><sub>72</sub> **verb** ==wash, wash off, away, bathe== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (also of garments); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sweat***; compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ra—âƒu***</u></abbr>, ***overflow***, ***flood*** (on <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—***</u></abbr> = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> see [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi (1886), 727</sup>)); — 

**Qal**<sub>69</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Isa.4.4|Isa 4:4]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְחַץ‎</span> [[Deut.23.12|Deut 23:12]] + etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְחַץ‎</span> [[2Sam.11.8|2Sam 11:8]]; [[2Kgs.5.13|2Kgs 5:13]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחֲצוּ‎</span> [[Gen.18.4|Gen 18:4]] +; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְחֹץ‎</span> [[Gen.24.32|Gen 24:32]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְרָחְצָה‎</span> [[Exod.30.18|Exod 30:18]] +; ***Participle*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹחֶ֫צֶת‎</span> [[2Sam.11.2|2Sam 11:2]], feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹחֲצוֺת‎</span> [[Song.5.12|Song 5:12]] — 

**1.** transitive ***wash*** (with water), with accusative feet (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגלים‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּמַּיִם‎</span> often expressed), [[Gen.18.4|Gen 18:4]]; [[Gen.19.2|Gen 19:2]]; [[Gen.24.32|Gen 24:32]]; [[Gen.43.24|Gen 43:24]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.19.21|Judg 19:21]]; [[1Sam.25.41|1Sam 25:41]]; [[2Sam.11.8|2Sam 11:8]]; [[Song.5.3|Song 5:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּעָמָיו בְּדַם הָרָשָׁע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִר‎</span> [[Ps.58.11|Ps 58:11]] (figurative of righteous, at <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s vengeance); with accusative hands (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַיִם‎</span>) [[Deut.21.6|Deut 21:6]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***over***, in ceremonial, to express innocence), hence figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפַּי בְּנַקָּיוֺן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶר‎</span> [[Ps.26.6|Ps 26:6]]; [[Ps.73.13|Ps 73:13]] hands and feet [[Exod.30.19|Exod 30:19]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of laver), v[[Exod.30.21|Exod 30:21]]; [[Exod.40.31|Exod 40:31]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> ***id.***; all [[BDB#P|P]]); with accusative face (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּנָיו‎</span>) [[Gen.43.31|Gen 43:31]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); with accusative of person [[Ezek.16.9|Ezek 16:9]]; [[Exod.29.4|Exod 29:4]]; [[Exod.40.12|Exod 40:12]]; [[Lev.8.6|Lev 8:6]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשָׂרוֺ‎</span> (often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כבּס‎</span> of garments), [[Lev.14.9|Lev 14:9]]; [[Lev.15.13|Lev 15:13]] + 9 t. [[BDB#P|P]] ([[BDB#H|H]]); with accusative of parts of sacrificial victim [[Exod.29.17|Exod 29:17]]; [[Lev.1.9|Lev 1:9]]; [[Lev.1.13|Lev 1:13]]; [[Lev.8.21|Lev 8:21]]; [[Lev.9.14|Lev 9:14]] ***wash off, away***, with accusative of filth [[Isa.4.4|Isa 4:4]] (figurative). 

**2.** intransitive ***wash, bathe*** (oneself): [[Exod.2.5|Exod 2:5]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.11.2|2Sam 11:2]]; [[2Sam.12.20|2Sam 12:20]]; [[1Kgs.22.38|1Kgs 22:38]]; [[2Kgs.5.10|2Kgs 5:10]]; [[2Kgs.5.12|2Kgs 5:12]]; [[2Kgs.5.13|2Kgs 5:13]]; [[Isa.1.16|Isa 1:16]]; [[Ezek.23.40|Ezek 23:40]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person for whom), [[Ruth.3.3|Ruth 3:3]]; [[Lev.14.8|Lev 14:8]] + 14 t. [[BDB#P|P]] (often \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כבּס‎</span>); + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of laver [[2Chr.4.6|2Chr 4:6]] (twice in verse); of eyes, ***bathed*** in milk (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֶּחָלָב‎</span>) [[Song.5.12|Song 5:12]] (figurative); [[Job.29.6|Job 29:6]] (figurative), see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָלִיךְ‎</span>. **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֻחָ֑ץ‎</span> [[Prov.30.12|Prov 30:12]] ***be washed*** (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of filth, figurative); 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּמַיִם לֹא רֻחַצְתְּ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.4|Ezek 16:4]] (in figurative). **Hithpa\`el** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְרָחַצְתִּי במו שׁלג‎</span> [[Job.9.30|Job 9:30]] if ***I washed myself in snow*** (figurative).
